::: {.alignleft}
![](Mastodon-logo_jy-01.png){width=275}
 
Mastodon is a large-scale tracking and track-editing framework for large, multi-view images.

These are typically generated in the domain Development Biology or
Stem-Cell Biology or Cell Biology.

Main features:

- Lazy-loading of TB sized image data
- Automated cell or particle tracking
- Manual curation and correction of tracking results
- Manual and semi-automatic tracking
:::
